mods.abstract: $20 REWARD.--RUNAWAY FROM the undersigned, on the 8th of this month, at 11 o'clock a. m., a mulatto man named JACK, aged 32 years, 5 feet 8 inches high, well made, and has some scars on his face. The slave ranaway to avoid a chastisement that he merited. The undersigned offers a reward of $20 to whoever will return the man to him. If he will not surrender after the lawful notice, I shall regret no consequences that may occasion his loss. J. B. LETOURNEUR. Opelousas, 10 april, 1845.-2t

detail.title: The St. Landry Whig. : (Opelousas, Parish of St. Landry, La.) 1844-1855
